contentrichtext.text: '''Balin''' can refer to: *[[Balin (Middle-earth)]], a Dwarf in J. R. R. Tolkien's legendarium of Middle-earth *[[Sir Balin]], a courageous knight in the legend of King Arthur *[[Balin (Hinduism)]], a monkey king of Kishkindhya and a son of Indra in Hinduism, killed by Rama '''People''' *[[Mireille Balin]] (1911-1968), French actress *[[Ina Balin]] (1937-1990), American actress *[[Marty Balin]] (born 1942), American musician **''[[Balin (album)|Balin]]'', Marty Balin's debut solo album *"El Balin", nickname of Honduran soccer player [[Eduardo Bennet]] '''Places''' *[[Balin, Iran]], a village in Kermanshah Province, Iran *[[Balin, Inowrocław County]] in Kuyavian-Pomeranian Voivodeship (north-central Poland) *[[Balin, Rypin County]] in Kuyavian-Pomeranian Voivodeship (north-central Poland) *[[Balin, Łódź Voivodeship]] (central Poland) *[[Balin, Lesser Poland Voivodeship]] (south Poland) ==See also== *[[Baline]] *[[Balinese (disambiguation)]] *[[Baling]] *[[Balinge]] *[[Ballin (disambiguation)]] {{disambig|geo}}
